title.text: An Empirical Study of the Impact of Idioms on Phrase Based Statistical Machine Translation of English to Brazilian-Portuguese

entities.text: Phrase Based Statistical Machine Translation of English to Brazilian-Portuguese

abstractContent.text: This paper describes an experiment to evaluate the impact of idioms on Statistical Machine Translation (SMT) process using the language pair English/Brazilian-Portuguese.
Our results show that on sentences containing idioms a standard SMT system achieves about half the BLEU score of the same system when applied to sentences that do not contain idioms.
We also provide a short error analysis and outline our planned work to overcome this limitation.
